nf_ingredient_statement: Whole Grain Rice, Rice, Sugar, Fructose, Canola Oil, Cocoa Processed with Alkali, Salt, Molasses, Natural Flavor, Vitamin E (Mixed Tocopherols), and BHT Added to Preserve Freshness. Vitamins and Minerals: Calcium Carbonate, Iron and Zinc (Mineral Nutrients), Vitamin C (Sodium Ascorbate), a B Vitamin (Niacinamide), Vitamin B6 (Pyridoxine Hydrochloride), Vitamin B1 (Thiamin Mononitrate), Vitamin A (Palmitate), Vitamin B2 (Riboflavin), a B Vitamin (Folic Acid), Vitamin B12, Vitamin D3. Gluten free. Gluten free.
